## What is the SMART Program?

The SMART program a quarter long program where undergraduate students have an opportunity to conduct a statistical project under the supervision of a graduate student from UC Riverside's Statistics Department.

## Goals

- Provide undergraduate students the opportunity to conduct statistical projects.
- Provide graduate students with the opportunity to mentor students.
- Provide graduate students with the opportunity to develop a project.
